Title: Güeros
Writer: Alonso Ruizpalacios (screenplay), Gibrán Portela (screenplay), Alan Page (collaborator)
Actors: Tenoch Huerta, Sebastián Aguirre, Ilse Salas, Leonardo Ortizgris
Plot: Tomas is too much for his lone mother so she sends him to live with his older brother Federico, aka Sombra, in Mexico City.
Production: Postal Producciones, Conaculta, Instituto Mexicano de Cinematografía (IMCINE)
